Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Enums
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    io.grpc.auth.ClientAuthInterceptor
    use MoreCallCredentials.from(Credentials) instead.
    io.grpc.LoadBalancer.ErrorPicker
    Use new FixedResultPicker(PickResult.withError(error)) instead.
    io.grpc.reflection.v1alpha.ServerReflectionProto
    io.grpc.services.ChannelzService
    Use ChannelzService instead.
    io.grpc.services.HealthStatusManager
    Use HealthStatusManager instead.
    io.grpc.testing.StreamRecorder
    Not for public use
  • Enums 
    Enum Description
    io.grpc.okhttp.NegotiationType
    use OkHttpChannelBuilder.usePlaintext() or OkHttpChannelBuilder.useTransportSecurity() directly rather than OkHttpChannelBuilder.negotiationType(NegotiationType).
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    io.grpc.LoadBalancer.EMPTY_PICKER
    Use new FixedResultPicker(PickResult.withNoResult()) instead.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    io.grpc.Attributes.Key.of​(String)
    use Attributes.Key.create(java.lang.String) instead. This method will be removed in the future.
    io.grpc.Attributes.keys()
    This method is being considered for removal, if you feel this method is needed please reach out on this Github issue: grpc-java/issues/1764.
    io.grpc.Attributes.newBuilder​(Attributes)
    Use Attributes.toBuilder() on the Attributes instance instead. This method will be removed in the future.
    io.grpc.binarylog.v1.Address.Type.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.binarylog.v1.GrpcLogEntry.EventType.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.binarylog.v1.GrpcLogEntry.Logger.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.binarylog.v1.GrpcLogEntry.PayloadCase.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.CallCredentials.thisUsesUnstableApi()
    io.grpc.CallOptions.Key.of​(String, T)
    Use CallOptions.Key.create(java.lang.String) or CallOptions.Key.createWithDefault(java.lang.String, T) instead. This method will be removed.
    io.grpc.channelz.v1.Address.AddressCase.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.channelz.v1.ChannelConnectivityState.State.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.channelz.v1.ChannelTraceEvent.ChildRefCase.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.channelz.v1.ChannelTraceEvent.Severity.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.channelz.v1.Security.ModelCase.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.channelz.v1.Security.Tls.CipherSuiteCase.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.Context.CancellableContext.isCurrent()
    This method violates some GRPC class encapsulation and should not be used. If you must know whether a Context is the current context, check whether it is the same object returned by Context.current().
    io.grpc.ForwardingChannelBuilder.delegate()
    As of 1.60.0, use ForwardingChannelBuilder2 instead.
    io.grpc.ForwardingChannelBuilder.nameResolverFactory​(NameResolver.Factory)
    io.grpc.ForwardingChannelBuilder2.nameResolverFactory​(NameResolver.Factory)
    io.grpc.health.v1.HealthCheckResponse.ServingStatus.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.lb.v1.LoadBalanceRequest.LoadBalanceRequestTypeCase.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.lb.v1.LoadBalanceResponse.LoadBalanceResponseTypeCase.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.LoadBalancer.handleSubchannelState​(LoadBalancer.Subchannel, ConnectivityStateInfo)
    This method will be removed. Stop overriding it. Instead, pass LoadBalancer.SubchannelStateListener to LoadBalancer.Subchannel.start(io.grpc.LoadBalancer.SubchannelStateListener) to receive Subchannel state updates
    io.grpc.LoadBalancer.Helper.createResolvingOobChannelBuilder​(String)
    Use LoadBalancer.Helper.createResolvingOobChannelBuilder(String, ChannelCredentials) instead.
    io.grpc.LoadBalancer.Helper.ignoreRefreshNameResolutionCheck()
    Warning has been removed
    io.grpc.LoadBalancer.SubchannelPicker.requestConnection()
    override LoadBalancer.requestConnection() instead.
    io.grpc.ManagedChannelBuilder.nameResolverFactory​(NameResolver.Factory)
    Most usages should use a globally-registered NameResolverProvider instead, with either the SPI mechanism or NameResolverRegistry.register(io.grpc.NameResolverProvider). Replacements for all use-cases are not necessarily available yet. See #7133.
    io.grpc.MethodDescriptor.create​(MethodDescriptor.MethodType, String, MethodDescriptor.Marshaller<RequestT>, MethodDescriptor.Marshaller<ResponseT>)
    use MethodDescriptor.newBuilder().
    io.grpc.NameResolver.Listener2.onAddresses​(List<EquivalentAddressGroup>, Attributes)
    This will be removed in 1.22.0
    io.grpc.NameResolver.ResolutionResult.Builder.setAddresses​(List<EquivalentAddressGroup>)
    Will be superseded by setAddressesOrError
    io.grpc.NameResolver.ResolutionResult.getAddresses()
    Will be superseded by getAddressesOrError
    io.grpc.netty.NettyChannelBuilder.maxHeaderListSize​(int)
    Use NettyChannelBuilder.maxInboundMetadataSize(int) instead
    io.grpc.netty.NettyServerBuilder.maxHeaderListSize​(int)
    Use NettyServerBuilder.maxInboundMetadataSize(int) instead
    io.grpc.netty.NettyServerBuilder.maxMessageSize​(int)
    Call NettyServerBuilder.maxInboundMessageSize(int) instead. This method will be removed in a future release.
    io.grpc.okhttp.OkHttpChannelBuilder.negotiationType​(NegotiationType)
    use OkHttpChannelBuilder.usePlaintext() or OkHttpChannelBuilder.useTransportSecurity() instead.
    io.grpc.okhttp.OkHttpServerBuilder.forPort​(int)
    Use OkHttpServerBuilder.forPort(int, ServerCredentials) instead
    io.grpc.protobuf.services.BinaryLogs.createBinaryLog​(BinaryLogSink)
    io.grpc.protobuf.services.ProtoReflectionService.newInstance()
    io.grpc.reflection.v1.ServerReflectionRequest.MessageRequestCase.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.reflection.v1.ServerReflectionResponse.MessageResponseCase.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.reflection.v1alpha.ServerReflectionRequest.MessageRequestCase.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.reflection.v1alpha.ServerReflectionResponse.MessageResponseCase.valueOf​(int)
    io.grpc.ServerStreamTracer.serverCallStarted​(ServerCall<?, ?>)
    Implement ServerStreamTracer.serverCallStarted(ServerCallInfo) instead. This method will be removed in a future release of gRPC.
    io.grpc.services.CallMetricRecorder.recordCallMetric​(String, double)
    use CallMetricRecorder.recordRequestCostMetric(java.lang.String, double) instead. This method will be removed in the future.
    io.grpc.stub.AbstractStub.withChannel​(Channel)
    io.grpc.stub.StreamObservers.copyWithFlowControl​(Iterator<V>, CallStreamObserver<V>)
    Of questionable utility and generally not used.
    io.grpc.testing.TestUtils.loadX509Cert​(String)
    Not for public use
    io.grpc.testing.TestUtils.newSslSocketFactoryForCa​(Provider, File)
    Not for public use
    io.grpc.testing.TestUtils.preferredTestCiphers()
    Not for public use
    io.grpc.util.AdvancedTlsX509KeyManager.updateIdentityCredentials​(PrivateKey, X509Certificate[])
    Use AdvancedTlsX509KeyManager.updateIdentityCredentials(X509Certificate[], PrivateKey)
    io.grpc.util.AdvancedTlsX509KeyManager.updateIdentityCredentialsFromFile​(File, File)
    Use AdvancedTlsX509KeyManager.updateIdentityCredentials(File, File) instead.
    io.grpc.util.AdvancedTlsX509TrustManager.updateTrustCredentialsFromFile​(File, long, TimeUnit, ScheduledExecutorService)
    Use AdvancedTlsX509TrustManager.updateTrustCredentials(File, long ,TimeUnit, ScheduledExecutorService)
    io.grpc.util.ForwardingLoadBalancer.handleSubchannelState​(LoadBalancer.Subchannel, ConnectivityStateInfo)
    io.grpc.util.ForwardingLoadBalancerHelper.createResolvingOobChannelBuilder​(String)
    io.grpc.util.ForwardingLoadBalancerHelper.ignoreRefreshNameResolutionCheck()
    io.grpc.util.GracefulSwitchLoadBalancer.handleSubchannelState​(LoadBalancer.Subchannel, ConnectivityStateInfo)
